page.title: 17The Game 'Stuck in the Mud'
page.content: Stuck in the mud is a game which has to be played by three or four people or even more. One person is on, and all the other people have to run away. The person who is on tries to catch everyone else. When someone is caught, that person has to stand with their legs apart and they are not allowed to move. To free them, another person has to go under the legs of the person who is caught. The 'catcher' is not allowed to catch a person if they are all standing still with no one to free them, then the last person to be caught is then on. If a lot of people are all playing together, instead of catching everyone, the 'catcher' has to catch one person five times and then that person is on.
